text: [I've never seen anything like this before.] What—is—this?
[This is unbelievable.] I always thought they were fabulous monsters! Is it alive?
[This is an interesting situation.] Well, now that we have seen each other, if you'll believe in me, I'll believe in you. Is that a bargain?
[Now, let's get back to important matters.] Come, fetch out the plum-cake, old man! None of your brown bread for me!
[I know the answer!] It's a fabulous monster!
